items.question: What is the timeline for 1-page and 5-page digital design projects?
items.answer: A 1-page project typically takes 1-2 weeks, a 5-page project 3-4 weeks. This includes design, revisions, and testing. Timelines may vary with project complexity and feedback.

items.question: Do you offer ongoing support and maintenance services?
items.answer: Yes, comprehensive maintenance packages are available, including security/content updates, performance optimization, and technical support. Plans start at $99/month, customizable to your needs.

items.question: How do I get started?
items.answer: Simply book a free consultation. I will discuss your project requirements, goals, and timeline. A detailed proposal with pricing and scope will then be provided. Work begins upon approval and a 50% deposit.

items.question: What happens if I'm not satisfied with the final result?
items.answer: Unlimited revisions are offered during the design phase, plus a 30-day satisfaction guarantee post-completion. If not satisfied, I will work with you to make it right or provide a full refund.

items.question: Are there any additional costs I should be aware of?
items.answer: My quotes are comprehensive, covering all design work. Additional costs may include premium plugins ($50-200), custom integrations, or third-party services (e.g., hosting $10-50/month, domain registration $15/year).

items.question: Do you offer digital redesign services?
items.answer: Absolutely! I specialize in complete digital redesigns to improve user experience, conversion rates, and modern design standards. I can work with existing content or help create new content that serves your goals.
